name: chess
description: A chess app from scratch. Challenge friends and play at your convenience.

scripts.client: cd ui && cd client && npm start
scripts.server: cd api && cd server && node index.js
scripts.start: cd api && cd server && node index.js
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd ui && cd client && npm install && npm install --only=dev --no-shrinkwrap && npm run build
